about_the_game:
The Anno 1800™ Industrial Zone Pack adds several new ornaments that allow you to beautify your industrial districts like never before.
Different platforms, traffics signs, and elements like the Coal Tower allow you to create a bustling freight yard for your trains.
Use construction fences, cranes, and scaffolding to make your Industrial Revolution–era themed cities more alive than ever with realistic-looking construction sites.
detailed_description:
The Anno 1800™ Industrial Zone Pack adds several new ornaments that allow you to beautify your industrial districts like never before.
Different platforms, traffics signs, and elements like the Coal Tower allow you to create a bustling freight yard for your trains.
Use construction fences, cranes, and scaffolding to make your Industrial Revolution–era themed cities more alive than ever with realistic-looking construction sites.

name: Anno 1800 - Industrial Zone Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8.1 or Windows 10(64-bit versions only)
  • Processor: Intel i5 3470, AMD FX 6350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 670 GTX or AMD Radeon R9 285 (2 GB of VRAM, Shader Model 5.0)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 60 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8.1 or Windows 10(64-bit versions only)
  • Processor: Intel i5 4690k, AMD Ryzen 5 1400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 970 GTX or AMD Radeon RX 480 (4 GB of VRAM, Shader Model 5.1)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 60 GB available space

oflc.descriptors:
Mild violence and coarse language
Online interactivity

short_description: The Anno 1800™ Industrial Zone Pack adds over 20 new ornaments to proclaim the constantly evolving spirit of your city.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian, German*, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Russian*, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
